risks.description: Messaging overhead between main thread and worker might exceed DSP benefits for small buffers.
risks.mitigation_strategy: Use SharedArrayBuffer or transferable objects to minimize copying.

risks.description: Difficulty in synchronizing visual state with audio events processed in worker.
risks.mitigation_strategy: Implement a robust timestamp-based synchronization protocol.

growth_blockers.blocker: Missing Web Worker implementation for PitchDetector.

growth_enablers.enabler: Separation of pure DSP logic from DOM-dependent code in lib/pitch-detector.ts.

risks.description: Rendering many heatmap cells might slow down the dashboard on mobile.
risks.mitigation_strategy: Use canvas rendering or virtualization for very long sessions.

risks.description: Unauthorized access to private practice sessions.
Network jitter affecting real-time audio synchronization.
risks.mitigation_strategy: Use WebRTC for low-latency peer-to-peer data.

resolution_steps: Evaluate Socket.io vs WebRTC vs Supabase Realtime
